attributes.action: standardise holiday entitlement and make leave fair
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: why is that public sector workers are able to sign various contractual arrangements on leave ? Please give better guidance to employers on paid and unpaid leave - and remove this source of friction between middle managers and staff employed in the public sector.  Why do PMs have four holidays and I none because of caring responsibilities if we work for the same government ?

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
